title: EOD Update
text:
2nd Jan and before
â€¢ Refactored Scribe to be an MFE
â€¢ Struggled a lot with figuring out the best way to handle structured inputs on Scribe
â€¢ Pushed out a version with prompts on care_fe for demo sake
â€¢ Synced up with Gigin to help setup
â€¢ Updated to not pass any prompts on care_fe and changed the entire logic of handling structured inputs
â€¢ Made a short PR on Scribe BE that supports overriding the default prompts for easy experimentation
â€¢ Pushed the version where structured inputs work without DOM value injections
Next
â€¢ Extensively test if anything breaks
â€¢ Get all Scribe PRs merged

title: EOD Update
text:
Last few days
â€¢ Got Scribe MFE refactor merged
â€¢ Completely reverted back to manipulating state from manipulating DOM
â€¢ Fixed an issue with Scribe's Accept All button and medication request prompt
â€¢ Fixed an issue with Scribe button overlapping the save button
â€¢ Went through feild feedback on Scribe but could not replicate (mostly because I did not know Kannada, but I tried Hindi, worked fine)
â€¢ Made a short fix on landing repo to close navigation on mobile
â€¢ Reviewed, closed and took follow ups on any pending PRs / issues on landing
â€¢ Sorted out my project board
Next:
â€¢ Awaiting any further user feedback on Scribe
â€¢ Nothing else, will probably pick up Care plan
